name: A Dog's Day Out
description:
Controls: Up, down, left, and right to move. Z key to interact. Click the 'Start' button or press the Enter key on your keyboard to play.

Just a small carefree prototype about being a dog! There's not much to it. I just wanted to make something that might brighten someone's day. Made for My First Game Jam.

Font from here.

Music from here.
